meanings.definition: Relating to or involving both electromagnetic and weak nuclear forces.
meanings.sent1: The electroweak force is responsible for some types of particle interactions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the electroweak properties of subatomic particles.
meanings.sent3: The electroweak dance between particles is quite fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent4: The electroweak bond between the forces is crucial for understanding the universe.
meanings.sent5: The electroweak nature of certain phenomena can be quite complex to grasp.

meanings.definition: A theory in particle physics that unifies the electromagnetic and weak nuclear interactions.
meanings.sent1: The electroweak theory has revolutionized our understanding of fundamental forces.
meanings.sent2: Many scientists are researching the implications of the electroweak theory.
meanings.sent3: At the physics conference, they debated the electroweak theory with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The electroweak theory bridges the gap between two fundamental forces.
meanings.sent5: Studying the electroweak theory opens up new possibilities in particle physics.
